snippet: The blasts occurred in Maiduguri, a northeastern city that is the birthplace of the Islamic extremist group Boko Haram.
abstract: Nigerian officials and witnesses report bombings in Maiduguri, birthplace of Islamic extremist group Boko Haram, kill at least 52 people; dead include four women who set off explosives after soldiers challenged their attempt to enter city, and two explosions near mosque.
lead_paragraph: The blasts occurred in Maiduguri, a northeastern city that is the birthplace of the Islamic extremist group Boko Haram.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Bombings Kill 48 in Northeast
